   im sure youve got this, but just incase

http://aaevp.com/resources/resources2.htmBackground    Sound
         Portuguese    Language Crowd Babble
         In the search for an effective    background sound source, crowd babble has proven to be one of the more    effective. Brazilian ITC researcher, Sonia Rinaldi, made this Portuguese    language crowd babble sound track available to the AA-EVP. We have    reversed it and clipped any outstanding vocalization so that just a    steady flow of voice frequency sound is heard. It is only 30 seconds, so    you will want to either copy and paste several times to make the file    longer or play it in a loop.   Download this    mp3 file here.


Amy Sutter 

www.myspace.com/LON3_S7AR
